goal.ch: 這是一門關於股權衍生性商品定價的課程，共兩學期。第一學期目標在建立衍生性商品的定價理論基礎，第二學期在於數值計算。經過一年的訓練，同學應有能力可以評價市面上任何股權相關的衍生性商品的價格。
goal.en: “This is a one-year (two-semester) course in the equity-derivatives pricing theory including theoretical foundation and numerical computation. This semester aims at the first part, and the objective is to build theoretical foundation of the derivatives pricing theory. After finishing this one-year course, you will obtain the ability in pricing any kind of equity derivatives issued in the financial market.“

outline.ch:
“基礎財務數學 (Brownian Motion, Ito Lemma, Girsanov Theorem, etc.)
Binomial Tree Model (CRR Model)
平賭過程定價 (Martingale Pricing Theory)
Valuation of Plain Vanilla Options (Black and Scholes formula)
Valuation of Options on a Dividend-paying Stock (or Stock Index)
Valuation of Currency Options
Valuation of Binary Options (or Digital Options)
Valuation of Barrier Options
Valuation of Reset Options
Valuation of Asian Options.
Valuation of Rainbow Options
Other related topic in derivatives pricing“
outline.en:
